data.name: TeamHealthCheckWaiting
data.value: Please wait for the facilitator to start the team health check.

data.name: DeliveringValueText
data.value:
Good: We deliver great stuff! We're proud of it and our stakeholders are really happy.
Bad: We deliver total crap. We are ashamed of that. Our stakeholders hate us for that.

data.name: EasyToReleaseText
data.value:
Good: Releasing is simple, safe, painless and mostly automated.
Bad: Releasing is risky, painful, lots of manual work and takes forever.

data.name: FunText
data.value:
Good: We love going to work and we have a lot of fun together.
Bad: The work is boring.

data.name: HealthOfCodebaseText
data.value:
Good: We're proud of the quality of our code! It is clean, easy to read and has great test coverage.
Bad: Our code is a pile of dung and technical debt is raging out of control.

data.name: LearningText
data.value:
Good: We are constantly learning new things.
Bad: We never have time to learn anything.

data.name: MissionText
data.value:
Good: We know exactly why we are here and weâ€™re really excited about it!
Bad: We have no idea why we are here, there's no high lever picture or focus. Our so called mission is completely unclear and uninspiring.

data.name: PlayerOrPawnText
data.value:
Good: We are in control of our own destiny! We decide what to build and how to build it.
Bad: We are just pawns in a game of chess with no influence over what we build or how we build it.

data.name: SpeedText
data.value:
Good: We get stuff done really quickly! No waiting and no delays.
Bad: We never seem to get anything done. We keep getting stuck or interrupted. Stories keep getting stuck on dependencies.

data.name: SuitableProcessesText
data.value:
Good: Our way of working fits us perfectly.
Bad: Our way of working sucks!

data.name: SupportText
data.value:
Good: We always get great support and help when we ask for it!
Bad: We keep getting stuck because we can't get the support and help that we ask for.

data.name: TeamworkText
data.value:
Good: We are a great team that works great together.
Bad: We are a bunch of individuals who neither know nor care what the others on the team are doing.

data.name: TeamHealthCheckHelp
data.value: Please answer the following questions to assess the current state

data.name: TeamHealthCheckFinished
data.value: You have answered all the questions. Please wait for the other participants.

data.name: ConfirmMoveToFinish
data.value: Not all participants have submitted their responses. Do you want to end the survey?

data.name: TotalSummaryControlsHelp
data.value: Analyze the deviations of individual participants' answers from the average answers.

data.name: MeanAnswerHint
data.value: Mean answer within the current health check

data.name: TeamEngagementText
data.value: Although we are working remotely, we are able to engage and communicate with each other in a good way.

data.name: RoleClarityText
data.value: My role is very clear, I understand what I need to do and deliver.

data.name: AutonomyText
data.value: I have the freedom and flexibility to perform my day to day work.

data.name: IsolationText
data.value: I often feel isolated while working remotely.

data.name: WellBeingText
data.value: I have routines to take care of myself mentally and physically and we regularly discuss about this in our meetings.

data.name: ConnectednessText
data.value: I feel connected to my team, department and organization at large.

data.name: DistractionsText
data.value: There are low distractions at home, there is always an opportunity to focus on work processes.

data.name: RemoteSupportText
data.value: We support each other as a team and we have all the tools and resources we need to perform our job.
